mymetal.calculate.calmismatch package

Submodules

mymetal.calculate.calmismatch.calhetero module

Module contents

calmismatch module

This module contains functions for comparing atoms, calculating atom numbers, relative differences, mismatches, filtering results, and lattice stretching. These functions are useful for structural analysis and material property comparison.

Submodules:

  • calhetero: Contains functions for atom comparison, atom number calculation, and mismatch analysis.
